è®ºæ–‡æ ‡é¢˜ï¼šMicroRank: End-to-End Latency Issue Localization with Extended Spectrum Analysis in Microservice Environments

è®ºæ–‡æ¥æºï¼šWWW21

è®ºæ–‡é“¾æ¥ï¼šMicroRank: End-to-End Latency Issue Localization with Extended Spectrum Analysis in Microservice Environments | Proceedings of the Web Conference 2021 (acm.org)

æºç é“¾æ¥ï¼š

TL;DR

è¿™ç¯‡æ–‡ç« æå‡ºäº†ä¸€ä¸ªåˆ©ç”¨è°±åˆ†æå®ç°æ ¹å› å®šä½çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼šMicroRankï¼Œé€šè¿‡æ”¶é›†åˆ†æå¼‚å¸¸åˆæ­£å¸¸çš„traceæ•°æ®ï¼Œæ¥å®šä½å»¶è¿Ÿé—®é¢˜çš„æ ¹å› ï¼Œå½“MicroRankçš„å¼‚å¸¸æ£€æµ‹å™¨æ£€æµ‹åˆ°å‘ç”Ÿå»¶è¿Ÿé—®é¢˜æ—¶ï¼Œå°±ä¼šè§¦å‘æ ¹å› å®šä½çš„è¿‡ç¨‹ï¼šMicroRanké¦–å…ˆä¼šåˆ©ç”¨ä¸€ä¸ªPageRankçš„æ‰“åˆ†å™¨ä¸åŒtraceè¿›è¡Œé‡è¦æ€§è¯„ä¼°ï¼Œç„¶åè°±åˆ†æï¼ˆspectrum analysisï¼‰åˆ©ç”¨æ‰“åˆ†å™¨å¾—å‡ºçš„æƒé‡æ¥è®¡ç®—æ ¹å› æ’åºã€‚é€šè¿‡åœ¨å¹¿æ³›ä½¿ç”¨çš„å¼€æºå¾®æœåŠ¡ç³»ç»Ÿå’Œç”Ÿäº§ç³»ç»Ÿä¸­ï¼Œå¯¹æ¯”å…¶ä»–æ ¹å› å®šä½æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¦‚CauseInferå’ŒSieveï¼ŒMicroRankå¯ä»¥å¾—åˆ°æ›´åŠ æœ‰æ•ˆçš„ç»“æœã€‚

Algorithm

Spectrum-based fault localization

Spectrum-based fault localization (SBFL) ï¼Œè°±åˆ†æåœ¨æ•…éšœå®šä½ä¸­æ˜¯æ¯”è¾ƒæœ‰æ•ˆä¸”ç®€å•çš„æ–¹æ³•ã€‚ç®€å•æ¥è¯´ï¼Œåœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªç¨‹åº$P$å’Œå…¶å¯¹åº”çš„æµ‹è¯•é›†åˆä¸­ï¼Œå¯¹äºç¨‹åºä¸­çš„æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªå…ƒç´ $O\in P$ï¼Œå®šä¹‰ä¸€ä¸ªå››å…ƒç»„ï¼š

$$ (O_{ef},O_{ep},O_{nf},O_{np}) $$ $O_{ef}$: è¦†ç›–Oçš„æµ‹è¯•caseä¸­å¤±è´¥çš„æ•°é‡

$O_{ep}$: è¦†ç›–Oçš„æµ‹è¯•caseä¸­é€šè¿‡çš„æ•°é‡

$O_{nf}$: æ²¡æœ‰è¦†ç›–Oçš„æµ‹è¯•caseä¸­å¤±è´¥çš„æ•°é‡

$O_{np}$: æ²¡æœ‰è¦†ç›–Oçš„æµ‹è¯•caseä¸­é€šè¿‡çš„æ•°é‡

ç±»ä¼¼è½¯ä»¶æµ‹è¯•ä¸­çš„æ€è·¯ï¼Œå½“ç»è¿‡ä¸€ä¸ªæœåŠ¡æ‰§è¡Œçš„å¼‚å¸¸traceè¶Šå¤šä¸”æ‰§è¡Œæ­£å¸¸traceçš„æ•°é‡è¶Šå°‘ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆè¿™ä¸ªæœåŠ¡è¶Šæœ‰å¯èƒ½æ˜¯å¯¼è‡´å¼‚å¸¸çš„æ ¹å› ã€‚

System

MicroRankä¸»è¦åˆ†ä¸ºå››ä¸ªéƒ¨åˆ†ï¼šAnomaly Detector, Data Preparator, PageRank Scorer å’Œ Weighted Spectrum Ranker

ç³»ç»Ÿé€šè¿‡ä¸€ä¸ªæ—¶é—´çª—å£ï¼ˆæ–‡ä¸­æ˜¯30sï¼‰ï¼Œå¦‚æœå®æ—¶çš„å¼‚å¸¸å¤§äºä¸€ä¸ªæœŸæœ›å€¼ï¼Œå°±è®¤ä¸ºå‡ºç°äº†å¼‚å¸¸ï¼Œå¹¶è§¦å‘æ ¹å› å®šä½ï¼Œç”±Data Preparatoræ¥åŒºåˆ†æ—¶é—´çª—å£å†…çš„æ­£å¸¸/å¼‚å¸¸traceï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”æ„å»ºè°ƒç”¨å›¾ï¼Œç”±ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäºPageRankçš„æ‰“åˆ†å™¨ä¸ºæ¯ä¸€ä¸ªoperationï¼ˆå³æœåŠ¡æ¥å£ï¼Œä¸‹æ–‡åŒï¼‰è¿›è¡Œå¼‚å¸¸åˆ†æ•°å’Œæ­£å¸¸åˆ†æ•°çš„æ‰“åˆ†ï¼Œè¾“å…¥åˆ°Spectrum Rankerä¸æ–­çš„æ›´æ–°æƒé‡è¿›è¡Œæ’åº

Anomaly Detector

å¼‚å¸¸æ£€æµ‹å™¨ä¸»è¦è®¡ç®—æ¯ä¸ªoperationåœ¨ä¸€æ®µæ—¶é—´ï¼ˆæ¯”å¦‚ä¸€ä¸ªå°æ—¶ï¼‰å†…çš„å¹³å‡å¤„ç†æ—¶é—´ $\mu_o$ å’Œæ ‡å‡†å·® $\delta_o$ ,æ–‡ä¸­ç‰¹åˆ«è¯´æ˜äº†åªæœ‰åœ¨å‡ºç°é¢„æµ‹åå·®çš„æ—¶å€™æ‰éœ€è¦æ›´æ–°ä¸Šè¿°çš„ä¸¤ä¸ªå€¼ã€‚

åœ¨ä¸€ä¸ªæ—¶é—´çª—å£å†…ï¼Œå¼‚å¸¸æ£€æµ‹éœ€è¦ç»Ÿè®¡traceæ¶‰åŠçš„operationä»¥åŠå¯¹åº”çš„æ•°é‡ $count_o$ ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ä¸‹é¢å¼å­è®¡ç®—æœŸæœ›ä¸€æ¡traceçš„æœŸæœ›å“åº”æ—¶é—´ $L_{excepted}$ ï¼š

$$ L_{excepted} = \sum count_o \times (\mu_o + n \times \delta_o) $$ ä¸€æ¡traceçš„æœŸæœ›å“åº”æ—¶é—´è®¡ç®—ä¸ºå„ä¸ªoperationçš„n sigmaçš„ä¹˜ç§¯çš„å’Œï¼Œåœ¨æ–‡ä¸­$n=1.5$ï¼Œå¦‚æœå®é™…traceçš„å“åº”æ—¶é—´å¤§äºæœŸæœ›å€¼ï¼Œåˆ™ä¼šè¢«è®¤ä¸ºæ˜¯å¼‚å¸¸traceï¼ŒåŒæ—¶è§¦å‘æ ¹å› å®šä½å¹¶åˆ·æ–°æ—¶é—´çª—å£ã€‚

è¿™é‡Œå…¶å®å­˜åœ¨ä¸€äº›é—®é¢˜ï¼šå¯¹äºOpenTracingæ ¼å¼çš„spanæ¥è¯´ï¼Œå„ä¸ªspançš„durationæ˜¯åŒ…å«äº†å­spançš„durationï¼Œç†è®ºä¸Šåªéœ€è¦è®¡ç®—root spançš„durationå³å¯ï¼Œä¸éœ€è¦ç´¯åŠ æ¯ä¸ªspançš„durationã€‚

PageRank Scorer

æ–‡ä¸­ä¸ºäº†æé«˜è°±åˆ†æçš„æ€§èƒ½ï¼Œå¢åŠ äº†ä¸€ä¸ªåŸºäºPageRankçš„æ‰“åˆ†å™¨ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«å¯¹å¼‚å¸¸å’Œæ­£å¸¸çš„traceè¿›è¡Œæ¸¸èµ°è®¡ç®—æƒé‡ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚åŸºæœ¬æ€æƒ³å°±æ˜¯å¯¹traceä¸Šçš„æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªoperationè¿›è¡Œæ‰“åˆ†æ¥è¯„ä»·traceçš„é‡è¦æ€§ï¼Œè¶Šèƒ½å¤Ÿå¸®åŠ©æ‰¾åˆ°æ ¹å› çš„traceé‡è¦æ€§ä¼šè¶Šé«˜ï¼š

  1. å¦‚æœä¸€ä¸ªoperationè¢«è¶Šå¤šçš„å¼‚å¸¸traceç»è¿‡ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆå®ƒå¾ˆæœ‰å¯èƒ½æ˜¯æ ¹å› 
  2. å¦‚æœä¸€ä¸ªå¼‚å¸¸traceç»è¿‡äº†è¶Šå°‘çš„operationï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆè¿™æ¡traceçš„é‡è¦æ€§è¶Šé«˜ï¼Œå› ä¸ºå®ƒåŒ…å«æ ¹å› çš„èŒƒå›´æ›´å°ï¼ˆæ›´å®¹æ˜“å®šä½æ ¹å› ï¼‰
  3. å¦‚æœä¸€ç§traceå‡ºç°çš„æ•°é‡è¶Šå°‘ï¼Œé‚£ä¹ˆä¹Ÿéœ€è¦ç»™äºˆæ›´é«˜çš„é‡è¦æ€§

ç»è¿‡PageRankä¼šå¾—å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªå¾—åˆ†å‘é‡$v$ï¼š $$ v^{(q)} = dAv^{(q-1)} + (1-d) \cdot u $$ $d$æ˜¯å‚æ•°ï¼Œ$q$æ˜¯è¿­ä»£æ¬¡æ•°ï¼Œæ¯æ¬¡è¿›è¡Œè¿­ä»£è®¡ç®—éƒ½ä¼šæ›´åŠ æ¥è¿‘æœ€ç»ˆçš„ç»“æœï¼Œé™¤æ­¤ä¹‹å¤–è¿™ä¸ªå‘é‡è¿˜éœ€è¦çŸ©é˜µ$A$ä¸å‘é‡$u$ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­$A$æ˜¯å…³äºoperationå’Œtraceçš„çŸ©é˜µï¼š

$$ A = \left[ \begin{array}{c|c} \overbrace{A_{oo}}^{operations} & \overbrace{A_{ot}}^{traces} \ \hline A_{to} & 0 \end{array} \right] $$

å…¶ä¸­$A_{st}$ä»£è¡¨äº†ä»så‡ºå‘åˆ°tç»“æŸçš„çŸ©é˜µï¼ŒçŸ©é˜µä¸­çš„å€¼ä»£è¡¨è½¬ç§»çš„æ¦‚ç‡ï¼Œå³$\frac{1}{ç›¸é‚»èŠ‚ç‚¹çš„æ•°é‡}$ã€‚ä½œè€…æŠŠæ¯ä¸€æ¬¡è¯·æ±‚çœ‹ä½œå›¾ä¸­çš„ä¸€ä¸ªå•ç‹¬çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œæ„é€ äº†operation-traceçš„å…³ç³»å›¾ï¼Œå¦‚ä¸‹é¢å›¾3åˆ°å›¾6çš„å˜åŒ–ï¼š

åŸºäºå›¾6ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä¾¿èƒ½å¾—å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªå…³äºå‘é‡$[front, recommend, checkout, product, req1, req2, req4]$çš„å¼‚å¸¸å…³ç³»çŸ©é˜µï¼š

$$ A = \left[ \begin{array}{cccc|ccc} 0&0&0&0&1/2&1/3&1/3 \ 1/3&0&1/3&0&0&1/3&0 \ 1/3&0&0&0&0&0&1/3 \ 1/3&1&1&0&1/2&1/3&1/3 \ \hline 1/3&0&0&1/3&0&0&0 \ 1/3&0&1&1/3&0&0&0 \ 1/3&1&0&1/3&0&0&0 \ \end{array} \right] $$

ä½œè€…è®¤ä¸ºç³»ç»Ÿçš„æ¥å£ä¹‹é—´çš„è°ƒç”¨å…³ç³»å›¾ï¼Œå³$A_{oo}$ï¼Œ æ˜¯ç›¸å¯¹ç¨³å®šçš„ï¼Œè€Œæ ¹å› å¾€å¾€å¯¹operation-traceå›¾ï¼Œå³$A_{ot}$å’Œ$A_{to}$å½±å“æ›´å¤§ï¼Œäºæ˜¯é€šè¿‡å¢åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªå‚æ•°${\omega}(0\le\omega\le1)$æ¥é™ä½è°ƒç”¨å…³ç³»å›¾çš„å½±å“ï¼š

$$ A = \left[ \begin{array}{c|c} \omega A_{oo} & A_{ot} \ \hline A_{to} & 0 \end{array} \right] $$

æ–‡ä¸­ç”¨å‘é‡$u$æ¥è®¡ç®—traceè¦†ç›–èŒƒå›´å’Œç§ç±»æ•°é‡çš„å½±å“ï¼š$u = [u_o^T, u_t^T]^T$ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­åªéœ€è¦è€ƒè™‘traceçš„å½±å“ï¼Œæ•…operationçš„å‘é‡$u_o$æ˜¯$\vec{0}$ã€‚å¯¹$u_t$æ¥è¯´ï¼Œæ¯ä¸€æ¡å¼‚å¸¸traceçš„é‡è¦æ€§å¾—åˆ†$\theta_i$éµå¾ªä»¥ä¸‹è®¡ç®—æ–¹æ³•ï¼š $$ \theta_i = \varphi\cdot\frac{n_i^{-1}}{\sum n_j^{-1}} + (1-\varphi)\cdot\frac{k_i^{-1}}{\sum k_j^{-1}} $$ $n_i$ä¸ºå¼‚å¸¸trace $i$ç»è¿‡operationçš„æ•°é‡ï¼ˆè¦†ç›–èŒƒå›´ï¼‰ï¼Œ$k_i$åˆ™ä¸ºè¯¥å¼‚å¸¸traceçš„æ•°é‡ã€‚$0\le\varphi\le1$ï¼Œæ–‡ä¸­é»˜è®¤ä¸º0.5ï¼Œç”¨äºå¹³è¡¡traceèŒƒå›´å’Œtraceæ•°é‡çš„å‚æ•°ã€‚å¯¹äºæ­£å¸¸çš„traceï¼Œåˆ™ç»è¿‡operationçš„æ•°é‡å¹¶ä¸èƒ½å¤Ÿååº”é‡è¦æ€§ï¼ˆå› ä¸ºå®ƒä»¬çš„ç»“æ„éƒ½æ˜¯ä¸€æ ·çš„ï¼‰ï¼Œå› æ­¤åªéœ€è¦è®¡ç®—$\frac{k_i^{-1}}{\sum k_j^{-1}}$å³å¯ã€‚

å½“è®¡ç®—å‡ºçŸ©é˜µ$A$ä¸å‘é‡$u$åï¼Œåˆ™å¯ä»¥è®¡ç®—pagerankåˆ†æ•°ï¼Œåˆå§‹åŒ–$v$: $$ v^{(0)}=[v_o^T, v_t^T]^T=[\frac{1}{N_o},\frac{1}{N_o},\cdots,\frac{1}{N_o},\frac{1}{N_t},\frac{1}{N_t},\cdots,\frac{1}{N_t}]^T $$ $N_o$å’Œ$N_t$åˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯operationæ•°é‡å’Œtraceç§ç±»çš„æ•°é‡ï¼ˆä¸Šæ–‡ä¾‹å­ä¸­çš„req1,2,3åˆ™ä¸ºä¸‰ç§traceï¼‰ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰å¼è¿­ä»£è®¡ç®—ï¼ˆå®ä¾‹ä»£ç ä¸­è¿­ä»£æ¬¡æ•°ä¸º25ï¼‰ï¼Œæœ€åå¾—å‡ºæ­£å¸¸çš„è¯„åˆ†På’Œå¼‚å¸¸traceè¯„åˆ†å‘é‡

Weighted Spectrum Ranker

æœ€åï¼ŒæŒ‰ç…§è°±åˆ†æçš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œè®¡ç®—å¼€å¤´å¼(1)ä¸­æåˆ°çš„å››ä¸ªå€¼ï¼š

$$ \begin{array} \ O_{ef} = F * N_{ef}, & O_{nf} = F * (N_f - N_{ef}) \ O_{ep} = P * N_{ep}, & O_{np} = P * (N_p - N_{ep}) \end{array} $$

ä¹‹åå¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®ä¸‹è¡¨æ‰€ç¤ºçš„æ–¹æ³•è®¡ç®—å¯¹åº”çš„å€¼ï¼Œä½œè€…æ²¡æœ‰è§£é‡Šå¦‚ä½•é€‰æ‹©ï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯é€šè¿‡å®éªŒå¯¹æ¯”å„ç§è®¡ç®—æ–¹æ³•çš„æ•ˆæœ

Experiments

ä¸åŒè®¡ç®—æ–¹æ³•çš„å¯¹æ¯”ï¼š

  2. ä½œè€…è®¤ä¸ºè°ƒç”¨å…³ç³»æ˜¯ç¨³å®šçš„ï¼Œç„¶è€Œç°å®æƒ…å†µæ˜¯å¯èƒ½ä¸šåŠ¡ç³»ç»Ÿä¸­åªæœ‰éƒ¨åˆ†ç³»ç»Ÿèƒ½å¤Ÿç»´æŒç¨³å®šçš„è°ƒç”¨å…³ç³»
  3. æ–‡ä¸­çš„èŠ‚ç‚¹operationå…¶å®æ—¢å¯ä»¥æ˜¯æœåŠ¡ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥æ˜¯æœåŠ¡å®ä¾‹æˆ–è€…æ¥å£ï¼Œä½œè€…åœ¨è¿™ä¸€å—çš„åŒºåˆ«å¹¶æ²¡æœ‰è¯¦ç»†é˜è¿°
  4. å¦å¤–åœ¨è®¡ç®—trace latencyæ—¶ä¹Ÿå­˜åœ¨ä¸€äº›é—®é¢˜ï¼Œå¯¹äºOpenTracingè§„èŒƒçš„traceæ•°æ®è€Œè¨€ï¼Œæœ€é¡¶çº§çš„root spanå·²ç»åŒ…å«äº†æ•´æ¡traceçš„è€—æ—¶æ•°æ®ï¼Œåœ¨æ–‡ä¸­å´ç”¨äº†æ‰€æœ‰spanç´¯åŠ çš„æ–¹æ³•è®¡ç®—æ€»è€—æ—¶ã€‚
  5. æ–‡ä¸­æŠŠè°ƒç”¨traceå½“ä½œèŠ‚ç‚¹ä¸operationç»Ÿä¸€å½¢æˆä¸€å¼ ä¾èµ–å›¾çš„æ–¹å¼æ¯”è¾ƒæœ‰å€Ÿé‰´æ„ä¹‰ï¼Œè°±åˆ†æçš„æ–¹å¼è™½ç„¶ç®€å•æ·³æœ´ï¼Œå½“æ—¶é€šè¿‡å¤ç°å®éªŒè¡¨æ˜åœ¨å¤§å¤šæ•°åœºæ™¯ä¸‹è¿˜æ˜¯æœ€æœ‰æ•ˆçš„ã€‚
  6. ä½œè€…è™½ç„¶è®¨è®ºäº†traceæ•°é‡å¯¹ç»“æœçš„å½±å“ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æ²¡æœ‰è®¨è®ºå¯¹æ€§èƒ½çš„å½±å“ï¼Œå¯¹äºåœ¨çº¿æ–¹æ³•æ¥è¯´ï¼Œæ€§èƒ½å¾€å¾€ä¹Ÿæ˜¯éœ€è¦è€ƒè™‘çš„ä¸€ç‚¹ï¼Œåœ¨æˆ‘å¤ç°çš„å®éªŒä¸­ï¼Œåˆ©ç”¨å·¥ä¸šç•Œçš„å®é™…traceï¼Œ5minsçš„æ•°é‡çº§å¤§æ¦‚åœ¨ä¸‡çº§åˆ«ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶åœ¨pagerankçš„æ€§èƒ½å°±ä¼šéå¸¸å·®ï¼Œå¾€å¾€éœ€è¦å‡ åä¸ªå°æ—¶ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥è¿˜æœ‰ä¸å°‘æ”¹è¿›çš„ç©ºé—´

    image: linuxserver/jellyfin:10.7.7
    container_name: jellyfin
    ports:
      - 8096:8096 # web ui
      - 8920:8920 # https
      - 7359:7359/udp
      - 1900:1900/udp
    group_add:
      - 109 # add to render group, see: cat /etc/group | grep render
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=Asia/Shanghai
    volumes:
      - /data/config/jellyfin:/config # é…ç½®
      - jfcache:/cache
      - /data/share/media:/data

      - /dev/dri:/dev/dri # Intel é›†æ˜¾é©±åŠ¨
    restart: unless-stopped

  qbittorrent:
    image: linuxserver/qbittorrent:4.4.0
    container_name: qbittorrent
    ports:
      - 6881:6881
      - 6881:6881/udp
      - 8080:8080 # web ui
    environment:
      - PUID=1000
      - PGID=1000
      - TZ=Asia/Shanghai
      - WEBUI_PORT=8080
    volumes:
      - /data/config/qbittorrent:/config
      - /data/share/pt/qbittorrent/downloads:/downloads
      - /data/cert:/cert

  webdav: # webdavæœåŠ¡å™¨ï¼Œå¤–ç½‘ä½¿ç”¨æ€§èƒ½ä¸å¤ªå¥½
    image: hacdias/webdav:v4.1.1

    command: [ "--config", "/opt/webdav.config.yml" ]
    volumes:
      - /data/share:/data
      - /data/config/webdav/webdav.config.yml:/opt/webdav.config.yml
      - /data/cert:/cert
    restart: unless-stopped

  tmm: # ä¸€ä¸ªå½±éŸ³åˆ®å‰Šè½¯ä»¶ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥éƒ¨ç½²åˆ°æœåŠ¡å™¨ä¸Šé€šè¿‡vnrè¿œç¨‹ä½¿ç”¨
    image: tinymediamanager/tinymediamanager:4.2.5.1

}

public class demo {

    switch v := any.(type) {

    return "???"

// layout of Itab known to compilers
// allocated in non-garbage-collected memory
// Needs to be in sync with
// ../cmd/compile/internal/gc/reflect.go:/^func.dumptabs.

// this is a higher-order-function that returns a function
func add(x int) func(y int) int {
	// A function is returned here as closure
	// variable x is obtained from the outer scope of this method and memorized in the closure
	return func(y int) int {
		return x + y
	}
}

func main() {

	// we are currying the add method to create more variations
	var add10 = add(10)
	var add20 = add(20)
	var add30 = add(30)

	fmt.Println(add10(5)) // 15
	fmt.Println(add20(5)) // 25
	fmt.Println(add30(5)) // 35
}

ä½†æ˜¯å¯¹äºå‡½æ•°å¼ç¼–ç¨‹ä¸­å¸¸ç”¨çš„é€’å½’è°ƒç”¨æ¥è¯´ï¼Œç”±äºGoè¯­è¨€çš„ç¼–è¯‘å™¨ä¸æ”¯æŒå¯¹å°¾é€’å½’çš„è°ƒç”¨ä¼˜åŒ–ï¼Œåªèƒ½é‡‡ç”¨çº¯é€’å½’çš„æ–¹å¼ï¼Œå¯¼è‡´åœ¨é€’å½’æ—¶éœ€è¦è€ƒè™‘è°ƒç”¨å †æ ˆçš„å¤§å°ï¼Œå› æ­¤åœ¨ç¼–å†™é€’å½’ç¨‹åºçš„æ—¶å€™æˆ‘ä»¬ä¸å¾—ä¸è€ƒè™‘é€’å½’çš„è°ƒç”¨æ·±åº¦ï¼Œæˆ–è€…æ”¹å†™ä¸ºè¿­ä»£æ–¹å¼ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢å†…å­˜çˆ†æ ˆå¯¼è‡´çš„ç¨‹åºå¼‚å¸¸ã€‚

ä¸€ä¸ªé«˜é˜¶å‡½æ•°æ¨¡æ‹Ÿçš„å»¶è¿Ÿæ±‚å€¼æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ä¼ å…¥å‡½æ•°åè€Œä¸æ˜¯ä¼ å…¥å‡½æ•°çš„è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œé¿å…åœ¨ä¼ å‚æ—¶å°±è®¡ç®—å‡ºç»“æœï¼Œè€Œæ˜¯åœ¨å‡½æ•°æœ€åreturnåæ‰è®¡ç®—å¯¹åº”çš„ç»“æœï¼š

func add(x int) int {
	fmt.Println("executing add")
	return x + x
}

func multiply(x int) int {
	fmt.Println("executing multiply")
	return x * x
}

func main() {
	fmt.Println(addOrMultiply(true, add, multiply, 4))
	fmt.Println(addOrMultiply(false, add, multiply, 4))
}

// This is now a higher-order-function hence evaluation of the functions are delayed in if-else
func addOrMultiply(add bool, onAdd, onMultiply func(t int) int, t int) int {
	if add {
		return onAdd(t)
	}
	return onMultiply(t)
}

æœ€åï¼Œæ˜¯å…³äºå‡½æ•°å¼ç¨‹åºè®¾è®¡ä¸­çš„åº”ç”¨é€æ˜æ€§ï¼š

Functional programs do not have assignment statements, that is, the value of a variable in a functional program never changes once defined. This eliminates any chances of side effects because any variable can be replaced with its actual value at any point of execution. So, functional programs are referentially transparent.

const queryParamsIsNull = (event: APIGatewayEvent) => {
	if (event.queryStringParameters !== null) {
		throw new ApplicationError(
			'Error parsing request query params',
			['Query params should be empty'],
			StatusCodes.BAD_REQUEST
		);
	}
	return event;
};
const pathParamsIsNull = (event: APIGatewayEvent) => {
	if (event.pathParameters !== null) {
		throw new ApplicationError(
			'Error parsing request path params',
			['Path params should be empty'],
			StatusCodes.BAD_REQUEST
		);
	}
	return event;
};
const asUserPostEvent = (event: APIGatewayEvent) => {
	try {
		const parsedBody = event.body
			? JSON.parse(event.body)
			: {};
		return {
			...event,
			body: parsedBody
		};
	} catch (error) {
		throw new ApplicationError(
			'Error parsing request body',
			['Invalid JSON'],
			StatusCodes.BAD_REQUEST
		);
	}
};

// Option sets the options specified.  
func (s *Server) Option(opts ...option) {

}

            Unfortunately, an error has occurred:
                timed out waiting for the condition

        This error is likely caused by:
                - The kubelet is not running
                - The kubelet is unhealthy due to a misconfiguration of the node in some way (required cgroups disabled)

        If you are on a systemd-powered system, you can try to troubleshoot the error with the following commands:
                - 'systemctl status kubelet'
                - 'journalctl -xeu kubelet'

        Additionally, a control plane component may have crashed or exited when started by the container runtime.
        To troubleshoot, list all containers using your preferred container runtimes CLI.

        Here is one example how you may list all Kubernetes containers running in cri-o/containerd using crictl:
                - 'crictl --runtime-endpoint /run/containerd/containerd.sock ps -a | grep kube | grep -v pause'
                Once you have found the failing container, you can inspect its logs with:
                - 'crictl --runtime-endpoint /run/containerd/containerd.sock logs CONTAINERID'

# default.conf
server {
    listen       80;
    server_name  localhost;

    location / {
        root   /usr/share/nginx/html;
        index  index.php index.html index.htm;
    }

    error_page   500 502 503 504  /50x.html;
    location = /50x.html {
        root   /usr/share/nginx/html;
    }

    location ~ \.php$ {
        fastcgi_pass   php:9000;
        fastcgi_index  index.php;
        fastcgi_param  SCRIPT_FILENAME  /var/www/html/$fastcgi_script_name;
        include        fastcgi_params;
    }
}

function type(obj) {
    var toString = Object.prototype.toString;
    var map = {
        '[object Boolean]'  : 'boolean', 
        '[object Number]'   : 'number', 
        '[object String]'   : 'string', 
        '[object Function]' : 'function', 
        '[object Array]'    : 'array', 
        '[object Date]'     : 'date', 
        '[object RegExp]'   : 'regExp', 
        '[object Undefined]': 'undefined',
        '[object Null]'     : 'null', 
        '[object Object]'   : 'object'
    };
    if(obj instanceof Element) {
        return 'element';
    }
    return map[toString.call(obj)];
}

function deepClone(data) {
    var t = type(data), o;
    
    if(t === 'array') {
        o = [];
    }else if( t === 'object') {
        o = {};
    }else {  // ç›´æ¥èµ‹å€¼çš„å˜é‡
        return data;
    }
    
    if(t === 'array') {
        for (let i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
            o.push(deepClone(data[i]));
        }
        return o;
    }else if( t === 'object') {
        for(let i in data) {
            o[i] = deepClone(data[i]);
        }
        return o;
    }
}

/**
 * åŒºåˆ†Objectæ•°æ®ç±»å‹
 * @param {Object} obj 
 * @returns {String} typename
 */
function objType(obj) {
    if (typeof obj !== 'object')
        return 'notObject'

    var toString = Object.prototype.toString
    var map = {
        '[object Array]': 'array',
        '[object RegExp]': 'regExp',
        '[object Date]': 'date',
        '[object Object]': 'object',
    }

    return map[toString.call(obj)]
}

/**
 * è·å–æ­£åˆ™å¯¹è±¡çš„flag
 * @param {RegExp} re æ­£åˆ™å¯¹è±¡
 */
function getRegFlag(re) {
    var flag = ''
    if (re.global)
        flag += 'g'
    if (re.ignoreCase)
        flag += 'i'
    if (re.multiline)
        flag += 'm'

    return flag
}

/**
 * DeepClone
 * @param {Object} obj æ·±å…‹éš†å¯¹è±¡
 * @returns {Object} å…‹éš†åçš„æ–°å¯¹è±¡
 */
function deepClone(obj) {
    // ç»´æŠ¤ä¸¤ä¸ªæ•°ç»„å­˜å‚¨å·²ç»å…‹éš†è¿‡çš„å¯¹è±¡å¤„ç†å¾ªç¯å¼•ç”¨
    var sourceList = []
    var targetList = []

    function _clone(source) {
        // null ä¼šè¢«typeofè®¤ä¸ºæ˜¯object ä¸€ä¸ªä¸€ç›´æœªè¢«è§£å†³çš„bug
        if (source === null)
            return null

        if (typeof source !== 'object') // åŒ…æ‹¬functionä¹Ÿç›´æ¥è¿”å›
            return source

        let type = objType(source)
        let proto, target

        if (type === 'array') {
            target = []
        }
        else if(type === 'RegExp') {
            target = new RegExp(source.source, getRegFlag(source))
        }
        else if(type === 'date') {
            target = new Data(source.getTime())
        }
        else
        {
            // å¤åˆ¶åŸå‹é“¾
            proto = Object.getPrototypeOf(source)
            target = Object.create(proto)
        }

        // å¦‚æœå·²ç»å…‹éš†è¿‡
        const index = sourceList.indexOf(source)
        if(index != -1) { 
            return sourceList[index]
        }

        sourceList.push(source)
        targetList.push(target)

        // é€’å½’å…‹éš†
        for (let item in source) {
            target[item] = _clone(source[item])
        }
        
        return target
    }


    return _clone(obj)
}

semaphore fillCount = 0; // å·²ç”Ÿäº§é¡¹ç›®æ•°
semaphore emptyCount = BUFFER_SIZE; // å‰©ä½™é¡¹ç›®æ•°

procedure producer() {
    while (true) {
        item = produceItem();
        down(emptyCount);
            putItemIntoBuffer(item);
        up(fillCount);
    }
}

procedure consumer() {
    while (true) {
        down(fillCount);
            item = removeItemFromBuffer();
        up(emptyCount);
        consumeItem(item);
    }
}

semaphore mutex = 1;	// äº’æ–¥é”
semaphore fillCount = 0;
semaphore emptyCount = BUFFER_SIZE;

procedure producer() {
    while (true) {
        item = produceItem();
        down(emptyCount);
            down(mutex);	// ä¿è¯ä¸€æ¬¡åªæœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªè¿›ç¨‹åœ¨æ“ä½œç¼“å†²åŒº
                putItemIntoBuffer(item);
            up(mutex);
        up(fillCount);
    }
}
procedure consumer() {
    while (true) {
        down(fillCount);
            down(mutex);
                item = removeItemFromBuffer();
            up(mutex);
        up(emptyCount);
        consumeItem(item);
    }
}

typedef struct Node
{
    int data;
    struct Node *next;
} Node;

Node *head, *tail;	// å…±äº«å˜é‡æŒ‡å‘é˜Ÿåˆ—çš„å¤´å°¾

bool is_empty()
{
    if (head->next == NULL)
    {
        return true;
    }
    return false;
}

void push_back(void* data)
 {
    Node* old;
    Node* newNode = new Node();
    newNode->data = data;
    newNode->next = NULL;
    
    do 
    {
        // è·å–æ—§å°¾ç»“ç‚¹æŒ‡é’ˆ
		old = tail;
    // ä½¿ç”¨CASåˆ¤æ–­æ­¤æ¬¡å†™å…¥æ˜¯å¦æˆåŠŸï¼Œåªæœ‰å€¼ä¸ºNULLæ‰å¯å†™å…¥æ–°ç»“ç‚¹
    }while (!cas(&(old->next), NULL, newNode));
    
    tail = newNode;
 }

int pop_front(int *e)
{
    Node *old;

    do {
    	if(is_empty())
        	return 0;
        // è·å–æ—§çš„å¤´ç»“ç‚¹
        old = head->next;
    // ä½¿ç”¨CASåˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰headæŒ‡é’ˆæ˜¯å¦è¿˜æŒ‡å‘oldå–åˆ°çš„å¤´èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œæ˜¯ï¼Œåˆ™ä»é˜Ÿåˆ—ä¸­å–å‡ºè¯¥èŠ‚ç‚¹ï¼Œå¦åˆ™å¤±è´¥
    } (!cas(&(head->next), old, old->next));
    
    *e = old->data;
    delete old;
    return 1;
}

task_para paras;
// pthread create
for (int i = 0; i < thread_num; i++) 
{
    paras.thread_num = thread_num;
    paras.my_num = i;
    paras.start_line = i * BmpHeight / thread_num;
    paras.end_line = paras[i].start_line + BmpHeight / thread_num - 1;
    if(pthread_create(&thread_id, NULL, thread_task, &paras) < 0)
    {
        cerr << "pthread_create error" << endl;
        exit(-1);
    }
    cout << "Thread " << paras.my_num << " start." << endl;
    threads.push_back(thread_id);
}

    paras[i].thread_num = thread_num;
    paras[i].my_num = i;

select id, visit_date, people
from (
    select id, visit_date, people, if((days > 0 and @ok = 1) or days >= 3, @ok:=1, @ok:=0) as ok
    from (
        select id, visit_date, people, if(people >= 100, @days:=@days+1, @days:=0) as days
        from stadium, (select @days := 0) as t1
    ) countedDays, (select @ok := 0) as t2
   order by id desc
) oklist
where ok = 1
order by id asc;

select distinct a.* from stadium a,stadium b,stadium c
where a.people>=100 and b.people>=100 and c.people>=100
and (
     (a.id = b.id-1 and b.id = c.id -1) or
     (a.id = b.id-1 and a.id = c.id +1) or
     (a.id = b.id+1 and b.id = c.id +1)
) order by a.id

/* ä¸´æ—¶rank function è¦æ±‚åŸè¡¨æŒ‰id score_marké™åº æ’åˆ—å¥½ */
delimiter //
drop function if exists myrank;
create function myrank(score_id int, score_mark float) 
returns int
READS SQL DATA
begin
    if(@pre_score_id is null or @pre_score_id != score_id) then
        set @pre_score_id := score_id;
        set @pre_score_mark := score_mark;
        set @row := 1;
        set @rank := 1;
    else
        set @row := @row + 1;
        if(@pre_score_mark != score_mark or score_mark is null) then
            set @rank := @row;
            set @pre_score_mark = score_mark;
        end if;
    end if;
    return @rank;
end //
delimiter ;

from (
    select *

    order by score_id asc, Score_mark desc, right(score_stuno, 2) asc
);
